bibliography:
Essais, F. Strowski (ed.), Paris: Hachette, 1912,
Phototypic reproduction of the “Exemplaire de Bordeaux”,
showing Montaigne’s handwritten additions of 1588–1592.

Essais, Pierre Villey (ed.), 3 volumes, Alcan, 1922–1923,
revised by V.-L. Saulnier, 1965. Gives the 3 strata indications,
probable dates of composition of the chapters, and many sources.

Michel de Montaigne. Les Essais, J. Balsamo, C.
Magnien-Simonin & M. Magnien (eds.) (with “Notes de
lecture” and “Sentences peintes”  edited by Alain
Legros), Paris, “Pléiade”, Gallimard, 2007. The
Essays are based on the 1595 published version.

La Théologie naturelle de Raymond Sebond,
traduicte nouvellement en François par Messire Michel,

1935.

Le Journal de Voyage en Italie de Michel de Montaigne. Ed.
by François Rigolot, Paris: PUF, 1992.

Lettres. Ed. by Arthur Armaingaud, Paris, Conard, 1939
